original: Majjhima Nikāya 144
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Channovādasutta
analyzed: channovāda sutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā ca sāriputto āyasmā ca mahācundo āyasmā ca channo gijjhakūṭe pabbate viharanti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena āyasmā ca sāriputto āyasmā ca mahācundaḥ āyasmā ca channo gijjhakūṭe pabbate viharanti

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā channo ābādhiko hoti dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena āyasmā channaḥ ābādhikaḥ hoti dukkhitaḥ bāḷha gilānaḥ

original: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā mahācundo tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ mahācundaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā sāriputto sāyanha samayam paṭisallānā vuṭṭhitaḥ yena āyasmā mahācundo tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam mahācundam etat avoca

original: “āyāmāvuso cunda, yenāyasmā channo tenupasaṅkamissāma gilānapucchakā”ti.
analyzed: āyāma āvuso cunda yena ayasmā channaḥ tena upasaṅkamissāma gilānapucchakā iti

original: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā mahācundo āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosi.
analyzed: evam āvuso ti kho āyasmā mahācundaḥ āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosi

original: Atha kho āyasmā ca sāriputto āyasmā ca mahācundo yenāyasmā channo tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā channena saddhiṁ sammodiṁsu.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā ca sāriputtaḥ āyasmā ca mahācundaḥ yena āyasmā channo tena upasaṅkamisu upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā channena saddhim sammodisu

original: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantaṁ channaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: sammodanīyam katham sāraṇīyam vītisāretvā ekamantam nisīdisu ekamantam nisinnaḥ kho āyasmā sāriputtaḥ āyasmantam channam etat avoca

original: “kacci te, āvuso channa, khamanīyaṁ, kacci yāpanīyaṁ? Kacci te dukkhā vedanā paṭikkamanti, no abhikkamanti; paṭikkamosānaṁ paññāyati, no abhikkamo”ti?
analyzed: kacci te āvuso channa khamanīya kacci yāpanīya kacci te dukkhā vedanā paṭikkamanti no abhikkamanti paṭikkama usānam paññāyati no abhikkama uti

original: “Na me, āvuso sāriputta, khamanīyaṁ na yāpanīyaṁ. Bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti, no paṭikkamanti; abhikkamosānaṁ paññāyati, no paṭikkamo.
analyzed: na me āvuso sāriputta khamanīyam na yāpanīya bāḷhā me dukkhāḥ vedanāḥ abhikkamanti no paṭikkamanti abhikkama usānam paññāyati no paṭikkamaḥ

original: Seyyathāpi, āvuso sāriputta, balavā puriso tiṇhena sikharena muddhani abhimattheyya; evameva kho me, āvuso sāriputta, adhimattā vātā muddhani ūhananti.
analyzed: seyyathā api āvuso sāriputta balavā purisaḥ tiṇhena sikharena muddhani abhimattheyya evam eva kho me āvuso sāriputta adhimattāḥ vātāḥ muddhani ūhananti

original: Na me, āvuso sāriputta, khamanīyaṁ na yāpanīyaṁ. Bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti, no paṭikkamanti; abhikkamosānaṁ paññāyati no paṭikkamo.
analyzed: na me āvuso sāriputta khamanīyam na yāpanīya bāḷhā me dukkhāḥ vedanāḥ abhikkamanti no paṭikkamanti abhikkama usānam paññāyati no paṭikkamaḥ

original: Seyyathāpi, āvuso sāriputta, balavā puriso daḷhena varattakkhaṇḍena sīse sīsaveṭhaṁ dadeyya; evameva kho me, āvuso sāriputta, adhimattā sīse sīsavedanā.
analyzed: seyyathā api āvuso sāriputta balavā purisaḥ daḷhena varatta khaṇḍena sīse sīsa veṭham dadeyya evam eva kho me āvuso sāriputta adhimattā sīse sīsa vedanā

original: Na me, āvuso sāriputta, khamanīyaṁ na yāpanīyaṁ. Bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti, no paṭikkamanti; abhikkamosānaṁ paññāyati, no paṭikkamo.
analyzed: na me āvuso sāriputta khamanīyam na yāpanīya bāḷhā me dukkhāḥ vedanāḥ abhikkamanti no paṭikkamanti abhikkama usānam paññāyati no paṭikkamaḥ

original: Seyyathāpi, āvuso sāriputta, dakkho goghātako vā goghātakantevāsī vā tiṇhena govikantanena
analyzed: seyyathā api āvuso sāriputta dakkhaḥ go ghātakaḥ vā go ghātaka antevāsī vā tiṇhena go vikantanena

original: kucchiṁ parikanteyya; evameva kho me, āvuso sāriputta, adhimattā vātā kucchiṁ parikantanti.
analyzed: kucchim parikanteyya evam eva kho me āvuso sāriputta adhimattāḥ vātāḥ kucchim parikantanti

original: Na me, āvuso sāriputta, khamanīyaṁ na yāpanīyaṁ. Bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti, no paṭikkamanti; abhikkamosānaṁ paññāyati, no paṭikkamo.
analyzed: na me āvuso sāriputta khamanīyam na yāpanīya bāḷhā me dukkhāḥ vedanāḥ abhikkamanti no paṭikkamanti abhikkama usānam paññāyati no paṭikkamaḥ

original: Seyyathāpi, āvuso sāriputta, dve balavanto purisā dubbalataraṁ purisaṁ nānābāhāsu
analyzed: seyyathā api āvuso sāriputta dve balavantaḥ purisāḥ dubbalataram purisam nānā bāhāsu

original: gahetvā aṅgārakāsuyā santāpeyyuṁ samparitāpeyyuṁ; evameva kho me, āvuso sāriputta,
analyzed: gahetvā aṅgārakāsuyā santāpeyyum samparitāpeyyu evam eva kho me āvuso sāriputta

original: adhimatto kāyasmiṁ ḍāho.
analyzed: adhimattaḥ kāyasmin ḍāho

original: Na me, āvuso sāriputta, khamanīyaṁ na yāpanīyaṁ. Bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti, no paṭikkamanti; abhikkamosānaṁ paññāyati, no paṭikkamo.
analyzed: na me āvuso sāriputta khamanīyam na yāpanīya bāḷhā me dukkhāḥ vedanāḥ abhikkamanti no paṭikkamanti abhikkama usānam paññāyati no paṭikkamaḥ

original: Satthaṁ, āvuso sāriputta, āharissāmi, nāvakaṅkhāmi jīvitan”ti.
analyzed: satthaḥ āvuso sāriputta āharissāmi na avakaṅkhāmi jīvitanti

original: “Māyasmā channo satthaṁ āharesi.
analyzed: mā ayasmā channo sattham āharesi

original: Yāpetāyasmā channo. Yāpentaṁ mayaṁ āyasmantaṁ channaṁ icchāma.
analyzed: channaḥ channaḥ icchāma

original: Sace āyasmato channassa natthi sappāyāni bhojanāni, ahaṁ āyasmato channassa sappāyāni bhojanāni pariyesissāmi.
analyzed: sace āyasmataḥ channassa natthi sappāyāni bhojanāni aham āyasmataḥ channassa sappāyāni bhojanāni pariyesissāmi

original: Sace āyasmato channassa natthi sappāyāni bhesajjāni, ahaṁ āyasmato channassa sappāyāni bhesajjāni pariyesissāmi.
analyzed: sace āyasmataḥ channassa natthi sappāyāni bhesajjāni aham āyasmataḥ channassa sappāyāni bhesajjāni pariyesissāmi

original: Sace āyasmato channassa natthi patirūpā upaṭṭhākā, ahaṁ āyasmantaṁ channaṁ upaṭṭhahissāmi.
analyzed: sace āyasmataḥ channassa na atthi patirūpā upaṭṭhākā aham āyasmantam channam upaṭṭhahissāmi

original: Māyasmā channo satthaṁ āharesi.
analyzed: mā ayasmā channo sattham āharesi

original: Yāpetāyasmā channo. Yāpentaṁ mayaṁ āyasmantaṁ channaṁ icchāmā”ti.
analyzed: channaḥ channaḥ icchāma ati

original: “Napi me, āvuso sāriputta, natthi sappāyāni bhojanāni;
analyzed: na pi me āvuso sāriputta natthi sappāyāni bhojanāni

original: napi me natthi sappāyāni bhesajjāni;
analyzed: na pi me natthi sappāyāni bhesajjāni

original: napi me natthi patirūpā upaṭṭhākā;
analyzed: na pi me natthi patirūpā upaṭṭhākā

original: api cāvuso sāriputta, pariciṇṇo me satthā dīgharattaṁ manāpeneva no amanāpena.
analyzed: api ca āvuso sāriputta pariciṇṇaḥ me satthā dīgharattam manāpena iva no amanāpena

original: Etañhi, āvuso sāriputta, sāvakassa patirūpaṁ yaṁ satthāraṁ paricareyya manāpeneva no amanāpena.
analyzed: etat hi āvuso sāriputta sāvakassa patirūpam yam satthāram paricareyya manāpena iva no amanāpena

original: ‘Anupavajjaṁ channo bhikkhu satthaṁ āharissatī’ti evametaṁ, āvuso sāriputta, dhārehī”ti.
analyzed: anupavajjam channaḥ bhikkhu sattham āharissati iti evam ete āvuso sāriputta dhārehi iti

original: “Puccheyyāma mayaṁ āyasmantaṁ channaṁ kañcideva desaṁ, sace āyasmā channo okāsaṁ karoti pañhassa veyyākaraṇāyā”ti.
analyzed: puccheyyāma mayam āyasmantam channam kañcid eva sace āyasmā channaḥ okāsam karoti pañhassa veyyākaraṇāya ati

original: “Pucchāvuso sāriputta, sutvā vedissāmī”ti.
analyzed: puccha āvuso sāriputta sutvā vedissāmi iti

original: “Cakkhuṁ, āvuso channa, cakkhuviññāṇaṁ cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassasi?
analyzed: cakkhu āvuso channa cakkhu viññāṇam cakkhu viññāṇa viññātabbe dhamme etam mama esaḥ aham asmi esaḥ me attā iti samanupassasi

original: Sotaṁ, āvuso channa, sotaviññāṇaṁ …pe…
analyzed: sotaḥ āvuso channa sota viññāṇam pe

original: ghānaṁ, āvuso channa, ghānaviññāṇaṁ …
analyzed: ghānaḥ āvuso channa ghāna viññāṇam

original: jivhaṁ, āvuso channa, jivhāviññāṇaṁ …
analyzed: jivhaḥ āvuso channa jivhā viññāṇam

original: kāyaṁ, āvuso channa, kāyaviññāṇaṁ …
analyzed: kāyaḥ āvuso channa kāya viññāṇam

original: manaṁ, āvuso channa, manoviññāṇaṁ manoviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassasī”ti?
analyzed: manaḥ āvuso channa manaḥ viññāṇam manaḥ viññāṇa viññātabbe dhamme etam mama esaḥ aham asmi esaḥ me attā ati samanupassasi iti

original: “Cakkhuṁ, āvuso sāriputta, cakkhuviññāṇaṁ cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassāmi.
analyzed: cakkhu āvuso sāriputta cakkhu viññāṇam cakkhu viññāṇa viññātabbe dhamme na itam mama na isī aham asmi na mā isī attā iti samanupassāmi

original: Sotaṁ, āvuso sāriputta …pe…
analyzed: sota āvuso sāriputta pe

original: ghānaṁ, āvuso sāriputta …
analyzed: āvuso sāriputta

original: jivhaṁ, āvuso sāriputta …
analyzed: āvuso sāriputta

original: kāyaṁ, āvuso sāriputta …
analyzed: kāya āvuso sāriputta

original: manaṁ, āvuso sāriputta, manoviññāṇaṁ manoviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassāmī”ti.
analyzed: manaḥ āvuso sāriputta manaḥ viññāṇam manaḥ viññāṇa viññātabbe dhamme na itam mama na isī aham asmi na mā isī attā ati samanupassāmi iti

original: “Cakkhusmiṁ, āvuso channa, cakkhuviññāṇe cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbesu dhammesu kiṁ disvā
analyzed: cakkhusmi āvuso channa cakkhu viññāṇe cakkhu viññāṇa viññātabbesu dhammesu kim disvā

original: kiṁ abhiññāya cakkhuṁ cakkhuviññāṇaṁ cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘netaṁ mama,
analyzed: kim abhiññāya cakkhum cakkhu viññāṇam cakkhu viññāṇa viññātabbe dhamme na itam mama

original: nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassasi?
analyzed: na isī ham asmi na mā isī attā iti samanupassasi

original: Sotasmiṁ, āvuso channa, sotaviññāṇe …
analyzed: sotasmi āvuso channa sota viññāṇe

original: ghānasmiṁ, āvuso channa, ghānaviññāṇe …
analyzed: ghānasmi āvuso channa ghāna viññāṇe

original: jivhāya, āvuso channa, jivhāviññāṇe …
analyzed: jivhāya āvuso channa jivhā viññāṇe

original: kāyasmiṁ, āvuso channa, kāyaviññāṇe …
analyzed: kāyasmi āvuso channa kāya viññāṇe

original: manasmiṁ, āvuso channa, manoviññāṇe manoviññāṇaviññātabbesu dhammesu kiṁ disvā kiṁ
analyzed: manasmi āvuso channa manaḥ viññāṇe manaḥ viññāṇa viññātabbesu dhammesu kim disvā kim

original: abhiññāya manaṁ manoviññāṇaṁ manoviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi,
analyzed: abhiññāya manam manaḥ viññāṇam manaḥ viññāṇa viññātabbe dhamme na itam mama na iso ham asmi

original: na meso attā’ti samanupassasī”ti?
analyzed: na mā iso attā ati samanupassasi iti

original: “Cakkhusmiṁ, āvuso sāriputta, cakkhuviññāṇe cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbesu dhammesu nirodhaṁ
analyzed: cakkhusmi āvuso sāriputta cakkhu viññāṇe cakkhu viññāṇa viññātabbesu dhammesu nirodha

original: disvā nirodhaṁ abhiññāya cakkhuṁ cakkhuviññāṇaṁ cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘netaṁ
analyzed: disvā nirodham abhiññāya cakkhum cakkhu viññāṇam cakkhu viññāṇa viññātabbe dhamme neta

original: mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassāmi.
analyzed: mama na iso ham asmi na mā iso attā ati samanupassāmi

original: Sotasmiṁ, āvuso sāriputta, sotaviññāṇe …
analyzed: sotasmi āvuso sāriputta sota viññāṇe

original: ghānasmiṁ, āvuso sāriputta, ghānaviññāṇe …
analyzed: ghānasmi āvuso sāriputta ghāna viññāṇe

original: jivhāya, āvuso sāriputta, jivhāviññāṇe …
analyzed: jivhāyaḥ āvuso sāriputta jivhā viññāṇe

original: kāyasmiṁ, āvuso sāriputta, kāyaviññāṇe …
analyzed: kāyasmi āvuso sāriputta kāya viññāṇe

original: manasmiṁ, āvuso sāriputta, manoviññāṇe manoviññāṇaviññātabbesu dhammesu nirodhaṁ
analyzed: manasmi āvuso sāriputta manaḥ viññāṇe manaḥ viññāṇa viññātabbesu dhammesu nirodha

original: disvā nirodhaṁ abhiññāya manaṁ manoviññāṇaṁ manoviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘netaṁ mama,
analyzed: disvā nirodham abhiññāya manam manaḥ viññāṇam manaḥ viññāṇa viññātabbe dhamme na itam mama

original: nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassāmī”ti.
analyzed: na iso ham asmi na mā iso attā ati samanupassāmi iti

original: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā mahācundo āyasmantaṁ channaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte āyasmā mahācundaḥ āyasmantam channam etat avoca

original: “tasmātiha, āvuso channa, idampi tassa bhagavato sāsanaṁ, niccakappaṁ manasi kātabbaṁ:
analyzed: tasmā ati ha āvuso channe idam pi tassa bhagavataḥ sāsana nicca kappam manasi kātabba

original: ‘nissitassa calitaṁ, anissitassa calitaṁ natthi.
analyzed: nissitassa calita anissitassa calitam natthi

original: Calite asati passaddhi,
analyzed: calite asati

original: passaddhiyā sati nati na hoti.
analyzed: passaddhiyā sati nati na hoti

original: Natiyā asati āgatigati na hoti.
analyzed: asati āgati gati na hoti

original: Āgatigatiyā asati cutūpapāto na hoti.
analyzed: āgati gatiyāḥ asati cutūpapātaḥ na hoti

original: Cutūpapāte asati nevidha na huraṁ na ubhayamantarena.
analyzed: cutūpapāte asati na ubhayam antarena

original: Esevanto dukkhassā’”ti.
analyzed: esevantaḥ dukkhassa ati

original: Atha kho āyasmā ca sāriputto āyasmā ca mahācundo āyasmantaṁ channaṁ iminā ovādena ovaditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamiṁsu.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā ca sāriputtaḥ āyasmā ca mahācundaḥ āyasmantam channam iminā ovādena ovaditvā uṭṭhāya āsanā pakkamisu

original: Atha kho āyasmā channo acirapakkante āyasmante ca sāriputte āyasmante ca mahācunde satthaṁ āharesi.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā channo acirapakkante āyasmante ca sāriputte āyasmante ca mahācunde sattham āharesi

original: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā sāriputto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha khalu āyasmā sāriputtaḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnaḥ khalu āyasmā sāriputtaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “āyasmatā, bhante, channena satthaṁ āharitaṁ.
analyzed: āyasmatā bhante channena sattham

original: Tassa kā gati, ko abhisamparāyo”ti?
analyzed: tassa kā gati kaḥ abhisamparāyaḥ ti

original: “Nanu te, sāriputta, channena bhikkhunā sammukhāyeva anupavajjatā byākatā”ti?
analyzed: nanu te sāriputta channena bhikkhunā sammukhāya iva an upavajja tā byākatā ati

original: “Atthi, bhante, pubbajiraṁ nāma vajjigāmo.
analyzed: atthi bhante pubbajiram nāma vajjigāmaḥ

original: Tatthāyasmato channassa mittakulāni suhajjakulāni upavajjakulānī”ti.
analyzed: tattha ayasmataḥ channassa mitta kulāni suhajja kulāni upavajja kulāni iti

original: “Honti hete, sāriputta, channassa bhikkhuno mittakulāni suhajjakulāni upavajjakulāni.
analyzed: honti hete sāriputta channassa bhikkhuno mitta kulāni suhajja kulāni upavajja kulāni

original: Nāhaṁ, sāriputta, ettāvatā ‘saupavajjo’ti vadāmi.
analyzed: na āha sāriputtaḥ ettāvatā vadāmi

original: Yo kho, sāriputta, imañca kāyaṁ nikkhipati aññañca kāyaṁ upādiyati tamahaṁ ‘saupavajjo’ti vadāmi.
analyzed: yaḥ kho sāriputta imam ca kāyam nikkhipati aññam ca kāyam upādiyati tam aham saupavajjaḥ iti vadāmi

original: Taṁ channassa bhikkhuno natthi.
analyzed: tam channassa bhikkhuno na atthi

original: ‘Anupavajjo channo bhikkhu satthaṁ āharesī’ti evametaṁ, sāriputta, dhārehī”ti.
analyzed: anupavajjaḥ channaḥ bhikkhu sattham āharesi iti evam eta sāriputta dhārehi iti

original: Idamavoca bhagavā.
analyzed: idam avoca bhagavān

original: Attamano āyasmā sāriputto bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandīti.
analyzed: atta manaḥ āyasmā sāriputtaḥ bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinandi iti

original: Channovādasuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ dutiyaṁ.
analyzed: channovāda suttam niṭṭhitam dutiya
